defaultChecked.description: The state of the switch when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its state.
defaultChecked.description_zh: 最初呈现开关时的状态。在不需要控制其状态时使用。

:v-model:checked.description: The controlled state of the switch. Must be binded with v-model.
:v-model:checked.description_zh: 交换机的受控状态。必须与 v-model 绑定。

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the switch.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则阻止用户与交换机交互。

required.description: When true, indicates that the user must check the switch before the owning form can be submitted.
required.description_zh: 如果为 true，则表示用户必须先检查开关，然后才能提交所属表单。

name.description: The name of the switch. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.
name.description_zh: 交换机的名称。作为名称/值对的一部分，与其所属表单一起提交。

value.description: The value given as data when submitted with a name.
value.description_zh: 使用名称提交时作为数据给出的值。

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。
